repo.description: the repository url to git clone from

rev.description: the revision or tag to clone at (previously sha).

hooks.description: A list of hook mappings. See https://pre-commit.com/#pre-commit-configyaml---hooks.

id.description: which hook from the repository to use.

alias.description: (optional) allows the hook to be referenced using an additional id when using pre-commit run <hookid>.

name.description: (optional) override the name of the hook - shown during hook execution.

language.description: (optional) Tells pre-commit on how to install the hook. See https://pre-commit.com/#supported-languages

language_version.description: (optional) override the language version for the hook. See https://pre-commit.com/#overriding-language-version.

files.description: (optional) override the default pattern for files to run on.

entry.description: (optional) Override default command to execute for the hook.

types.description: (optional) override the default file types to run on. See https://pre-commit.com/#filtering-files-with-types.

types_or.description: (optional) override the default file types to run on (OR). See Filtering files with types. new in 2.9.0.

args.description: (optional) list of additional parameters to pass to the hook.

stages.description: (optional) confines the hook to the commit, merge-commit, push, prepare-commit-msg, commit-msg, post-checkout, post-commit or manual stage. See https://pre-commit.com/#confining-hooks-to-run-at-certain-stages.

additional_dependencies.description: (optional) a list of dependencies that will be installed in the environment where this hook gets run. One useful application is to install plugins for hooks such as eslint.

always_run.description: (optional) if true, this hook will run even if there are no matching files.

verbose.description: (optional) if true, forces the output of the hook to be printed even when the hook passes.

log_file.description: (optional) if present, the hook output will additionally be written to a file.

pass_filenames.description: (optional) if false, this hook will be called only once without being called for each matching file.

repos.description:
Repository mappings of the current project
https://pre-commit.com/#pre-commit-configyaml---top-level

default_language_version.description:
Mappings for the default language versions of the current project
https://pre-commit.com/#pre-commit-configyaml---top-level

default_stages.description:
The default stages of the current project
https://pre-commit.com/#pre-commit-configyaml---top-level

files.description:
A file include pattern of the current project
https://pre-commit.com/#pre-commit-configyaml---top-level

exclude.description:
A file exclude pattern of the current project
https://pre-commit.com/#pre-commit-configyaml---top-level

fail_fast.description:
Whether stop running hooks after a first failure
https://pre-commit.com/#pre-commit-configyaml---top-level

autofix_commit_msg.description: custom commit message for PR autofixes
autofix_commit_msg.default:
[pre-commit.ci] auto fixes from pre-commit.com hooks

for more information, see https://pre-commit.ci

autofix_prs.description: whether to autofix pull requests. when disabled, comment "pre-commit.ci autofix" on a pull request to manually trigger auto-fixing

autoupdate_branch.description: branch to send autoupdate PRs to. by default, pre-commit.ci will update the default branch of the repository.

autoupdate_commit_msg.description: custom commit message for autoupdate PRs

skip.description: which hook ids to be skipped when running under pre-commit.ci

submodules.description: whether to recursive check out submodules
